item.title: 印度尼西亚爪哇岛东海岸发生 6.5 级地震
item.description: 印度尼西亚人口最多的岛屿爪哇岛东海岸发生 6.5 级地震，首都雅加达也有震感。【原文：A 6.5 magnitude earthquake struck off the eastern coast of Java, Indonesia’s most-populated island, with the tremors felt as far away as the capital Jakarta.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁聘请宾利老板接任首席执行官一职
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁聘请宾利首席执行官阿德里安-霍尔马克（Adrian Hallmark）接任首席执行官一职，以稳定这家与詹姆斯-邦德齐名的豪华汽车制造商。【原文：Aston Martin tapped Bentley’s chief executive officer, Adrian Hallmark, to take over as CEO and stabilize the luxury-car maker synonymous with James Bond.】

item.title: 德国商业前景改善程度远超预期
item.description: 德国商业前景的改善远超预期，这为德国经济从萎靡不振中复苏带来了希望。【原文：Germany’s business outlook improved much more than anticipated — feeding hopes that the economy will recover from a malaise that’s turned it into the euro zone’s laggard.】

item.title: 审计师称瑞典 Alecta 公司高管不应对失误负责
item.description: 一位审计师表示，瑞典最大的养老基金 Alecta 的董事会成员和首席执行官不应对导致 2023 年投资失败造成 31 亿美元损失的决策承担个人责任。【原文：Board members and chief executives at Sweden’s biggest pension fund Alecta should not be held personally liable for decisions that led to $3.1 billion in losses from failed investments in 2023, an auditor has said.】

item.title: 马来西亚以成本为由拒绝主办英联邦运动会的提议
item.description: 继澳大利亚之后，马来西亚也因成本问题拒绝了主办 2026 年英联邦运动会的机会，因为距离运动会开幕仅剩两年时间，主办方仍在继续寻找新的主办国。【原文：Malaysia followed Australia in declining an opportunity to host the 2026 Commonwealth Games due to cost concerns, as the organizers’ search for a new host continues with just two years left before the games start.】

item.title: 印度停止接收由 Sovcomflot 油轮运送的俄罗斯石油
item.description: 由于美国的制裁，印度所有的炼油厂现在都拒绝接受由 PJSC Sovcomflot 油轮运载的俄罗斯原油，这使得自两年前乌克兰入侵以来蓬勃发展的贸易进一步复杂化。【原文：All of India’s refiners are now refusing to take Russian crude carried on PJSC Sovcomflot tankers due to US sanctions, further complicating the trade that has flourished since the invasion of Ukraine two years ago.】

item.title: 美国银行称美联储会议前夕美股遭遇大量资金外流
item.description: 在美联储召开政策会议之前，美国股市出现大量资金外流，导致 S&P 500 指数创下历史新高。【原文：US stocks saw hefty outflows in the runup to the Federal Reserve’s policy meeting that took the S&P 500 Index to fresh all-time highs.】

item.title: 欧洲股市有望创 2012 年以来最长赢利期
item.description: 周五，欧洲股市从纪录高位回落，但仍有望连续第九周上涨，这是自2012年以来最长的连涨期，因为市场对经济的信心不断增强，而且即将降息。【原文：European stocks fell back from record highs on Friday but were still on course for a ninth straight week of gains, the longest winning streak since 2012, amid growing confidence in the economy and upcoming interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 高德美（Galderma）首次上市交易大涨，推动欧洲首次公开募股复苏
item.description: 护肤品公司高德美集团（Galderma Group AG）在瑞士首次公开发行股票，成为过去二十年来最大的首次公开发行股票之一。【原文：Skin-care company Galderma Group AG surged in its trading debut following one of Switzerland’s biggest initial public offerings of the past two decades, delivering a much needed win for Europe’s equity capital markets.】

item.title: 发电量下降后巴基斯坦电费和通货膨胀率将上升
item.description: 上个月，巴基斯坦的发电量降至近四年来的最低点，这将推高电费和通货膨胀。【原文：Electricity generation in Pakistan fell to the lowest in almost four years last month, which will push up power bills and inflation.】

item.title: 更多关于商业地产 "大脚开球 "的信息
item.description:
市场是借来的时间吗？【原文：

Is the market on borrowed time?

】

item.title: 塞内加尔将选出新领导人，为能源繁荣做准备
item.description:
总统选举举行之际，快速增长的经济正准备迎接石油和天然气红利

Presidential election taking place as fast-growing economy prepares for oil and gas bonanza

】

item.title: 桑坦德银行 "出色 "开局后实现 60 亿欧元资本回报
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）表示，经过强劲的开局，其股东今年有望获得超过 60 亿欧元（65 亿美元）的股息和回购。【原文：Banco Santander SA said its shareholders are on track for more than €6 billion ($6.5 billion) in dividends and buybacks for this year after a strong start.】

item.title: 中国敦促礼来公司在美国断供威胁下增加投资
item.description: 中国最高贸易官员敦促礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：China’s top trade official urged Eli Lilly & Co. to bolster its investment in the country, vowing to create vast opportunities for international pharmaceutical companies even as the US works to cut those ties.】

item.title: 据说 Samsonite 在考虑双重上市的同时仍保留收购选择权
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在香港上市的箱包生产商森美国际公司（Samsonite International SA）正在考虑在美国两地上市，但私有化交易的可能性依然存在。【原文：Hong Kong-listed Samsonite International SA is keeping the possibility of a take-private deal open even as the luggage maker considers a dual listing in the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国中央政府加大支出力度促进经济发展
item.description: 中国中央政府在今年年初加快了支出，这表明中央政府正在承担更多的融资责任，以支持经济，避免地方政府债务风险恶化。【原文：China’s central government accelerated spending at the start of the year, a sign it’s taking on more financing responsibility to support the economy and to avoid worsening local government debt risks.】

item.title: 摩根大通私人银行中国区主管8年后退休
item.description: 摩根大通银行私人银行中国区主管格蕾丝-林（Grace Lin）在这家美国银行工作 8 年后即将退休。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s head of China for its private bank Grace Lin is retiring from the bank after 8 years at the US lender.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：零售销售超预期，更多迹象显示 2024 年股市走强
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 伊拉克尚未修订预算，库尔德石油尚未恢复供应
item.description: 伊拉克石油部长哈扬-阿卜杜勒-加尼（Hayyan Abdul Ghani）表示，伊拉克政府仍在研究一项联邦预算修正案，该修正案将使巴格达能够向在库尔德斯坦工作的国际石油公司支付费用。【原文：Iraq’s government is still studying a proposed amendment to the federal budget that would enable Baghdad to pay international oil companies working in Kurdistan, according to Oil Minister Hayyan Abdul Ghani.】

item.title: 澳大利亚对《澳大利亚央行改革法案》的调查出现党派分裂
item.description: 参议院的一项调查显示，澳大利亚立法者在改革储备银行的法案上存在党派分歧，反对党坚持政府在出现严重争议时保留推翻政策决定的权利。【原文：Australian lawmakers were split along party lines over a bill to reform the Reserve Bank, with the opposition insisting the government retain its right to override policy decisions in the event of a serious dispute, a Senate inquiry showed.】

item.title: 中国股市反弹降温，原因是盈利令人失望，人民币走软
item.description: 受香港上市科技股下跌和一系列令人失望的财报影响，中国股市周五下跌，并将止住连续五周的涨势。【原文：Chinese stocks declined Friday and were set to halt a five-week rally, weighed down by losses in Hong Kong-listed technology shares and a slew of disappointing earnings reports.】

item.title: 下山需要向导。我们没有
item.description:
从高利率和高通胀中危险滑落是各地面临的挑战。世界各国的中央银行协调不够。【原文：

The perilous descent from high rates and inflation is a challenge everywhere. The world’s central banks aren’t coordinating enough.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 债券交易员对 Intrum 的债务高山敲响警钟
item.description:
与竞争对手一样，瑞典债务催收公司也利用巨额杠杆为其在不良贷款上的赌注提供资金。现在，它正努力应对严峻的新现实。【原文：

Like rivals, the Swedish debt collector took on massive leverage to fund its wager on bad loans. Now it’s struggling to cope with a hard new reality.

】

item.title: 波兰议员预计将对中央银行行长进行漫长调查
item.description: 波兰执政党正准备对央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）进行旷日持久的调查。【原文：Poland’s ruling party is gearing up for a drawn-out probe of central bank Governor Adam Glapinski, a lawmaker involved in the case said, warning of potential attempts to scupper the proceedings.】

item.title: 沙特经济改革的关键--沙特开发商 Roshn 失去首席执行官
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的开发商之一，被视为王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼万亿美元经济转型计划的重要推动者，其负责人已离开公司。【原文：The head of one of Saudi Arabia’s largest developers, seen as an important driver of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s trillion-dollar economic transformation program, has left the firm.】

item.title: 中国审查普华永道在恒大 780 亿美元欺诈案中的角色
item.description: 在中国恒大集团被指控诈骗 780 亿美元后，中国当局正在审查普华永道会计师事务所在该集团会计实务中的作用，从而加大了对这家全球会计巨头的压力。【原文：Chinese authorities are examining the role of PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP in China Evergrande Group’s accounting practices after the developer was accused of a $78 billion fraud, ramping up pressure on the global accounting giant that audited a slew of developers before the sector’s meltdown.】

item.title: 健康连锁店 Auna 首次公开募股融资 3.6 亿美元，定价低于发行区间
item.description: Auna SA 是一家业务遍及拉丁美洲的医疗保健服务提供商，在美国首次公开发行股票时，股票定价低于市场定价范围，共募集资金 3.6 亿美元。【原文：Auna SA, a health-care services provider with operations across Latin America, raised $360 million in its US initial public offering after pricing shares below a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国放松制裁后，中国石油将收购委内瑞拉石油
item.description: 在美国去年底取消对欧佩克产油国的制裁后，中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：PetroChina Co. is set to receive a cargo of Venezuelan oil, which will be used at its mega refinery in Guangdong, after the US rolled back sanctions on the OPEC producer late last year.】

item.title: 石油需求超预期，原油峰值计算面临考验
item.description: 全世界的石油使用量比以往任何时候都要多，今年的需求量再次超出预期，这让人怀疑全球石油消耗量将在多长时间内达到顶峰。【原文：The world is using more oil than ever and demand is outpacing expectations again this year, raising questions about how soon global consumption will peak.】
